price: (Nuh) dedi: “Gəmiyə minin! Onun üzüb getməsi də, dayanması da Allahın adı ilədir. Şübhəsiz ki, Rəbbim Bağışlayandır, Rəhmlidir”.
arabic: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱرۡكَبُواْ فِيهَا بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ مَجۡر۪ىٰهَا وَمُرۡسَىٰهَآۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla ir'kabū fīhā bis'mi al-lahi majrahā wamur'sāhā inna rabbī laghafūrun raḥīmun
